name: ANC Sports Pricing Engine
description: Calculates the quote for an LED screen. Requires 'width' and 'height' in feet. Optional 'environment' (indoor/outdoor).
author: ANC Tech

inputs.name: width
inputs.description: The width of the screen in feet (e.g. 13.5)

inputs.name: height
inputs.description: The height of the screen in feet (e.g. 42.1)
